1.0.name: wordpress/nextgen-gallery-image-optimizer
1.0.description:
This is a WordPress plugin for people who use the most popular NextGEN gallery and do care about website optimization, speed and page score. It should serve as a swiss-knife for image optimization (lossless compression) for your website.

Result: Google Page Speed will recognize all your images as 100% optimized, which will give you better score and page rank.

Practically that means:

  • Better page speed score for your website
  • Faster loading of images
  • Leads to overall better SEO site score and ranking

Supports

  • NextGEN, the most pouplar WordPress gallery
  • WordPress Media Library (in commerical version)
  • Active theme images optimization (in commercial version)

Features

  • Optimize all images in NextGEN Gallery (including thumbnails)

  • Automatic images optimization in NextGEN WordPress Gallery Plugin:

    • on image upload
    • on thumbnail gener
